full_text: F. DE NECOCHEA PUBLIC ACCOUNTANT 213 SECOND STREET, SUITE 225 a CALEXICO, CALIFORNIA 92231 o PHONE 357-3370 MESSAGE TO U S Immigration Service SUBJECT Ramon Wong Fong Song Morelos 251, 300 No. Lo A. Street Mexicali, Baja California Los Angeles, California DATE 10-3-67 Gentlemen: On July 19, 1967 / sent you Form 575 (A & B) certified by the U S Department of Labor and Petition Form (1-140) sponsored by my client Mr. T. H. Loo, 452 Main Street, EL Centro, California. As of this date Mr. Wong Fong Song has had no communicution from your office or the American Consulate at Tijuana, and is wondering whether LOS the documents will become very old if you do not take action at once. Your considerations and reply will be greatly appreciated. cc. U. S. Consul Respectfully yours, P. 0. Box 1358 San Ysidro, California BY tak Osheal RALL DATE NR FOR 00015 2 211 Los nc1 a I II 1321. VMC DECEIVED SIGNED NORM e The Drawing RECIPIENT RETURN THIS COPY TO SENDER
